TopicTitle: Conflicting Mods with Astronomer's Visual Pack?

Articles.Content:
Sorry about formatting, this is my first post. 

I'm haven't had much experience with modding in the past as this is my first ever PC, but I was wondering if there is anyone on here that could help me with figuring out an issue with Astronomer's Visual Pack. I honestly don't even remember what most of these mods even do specifically, so If someone could point out which mods I have to get rid of in order to get AVP working I would appreciate it. 

Here is a full list of the mods i'm using, titled exactly as they were downloaded:

  • PatchManager
  • Kopernicus
  • BetterTimeWarp
  • 0001_ToolbarControl
  • TextureReplacer-3.7
  • EnvironmentalVisualEnhancements-1.4.2.2
  • BLO_High
  • AVP_8kTextures
  • AVP.v.3.74
  • DistantObjectEnhancement
  • FilterExtension-1.6.1-3.2.2.17
  • CommunityResourcePack
  • 000_FilterExtensions
  • Firespitter
  • 000_USITools
  • UmbraSpaceIndustries
  • NearFutureSpcecraft
  • NearFuturePropulsion
  • WarpPlugin
  • [x] Science!
  • TriggerTech
  • scatterer
  • RealPlume-Stock_v1.3.1
  • SCANsat
  • RaginCaucasian
  • OPT_Reconfig
  • NearFutureSolar
  • NearFutureProps
  • NearFutureLaunchVehicles
  • NearFutureConstruction
  • MarkIVSystem
  • ModularFlightIntegrator
  • NavyFish
  • KerbalAtomics
  • KerbalChangeLog1.1.4
  • ksp-planetshine-master
  • DecayingRTGs
  • DeployableEngines
  • DynamicBatteryStorage
  • EngineLightRelit
  • FlightTracker
  • ForScience+v1.5.2
  • JSI
  • ContractConfigurator
  • CryoEngines
  • CryoTanks
  • CommunityTechTree
  • Chatterer
  • CollisionFXUpdated
  • 000_ClickThroughBlocker
  • 000_Toolbar
  • B9PartSwitch

Please and Thank You for any and all help!

Welcome to the forum

If you modlist is complete, the problem is not a mod conflict but a missing mod: ModuleManager

In addition:
 

14 hours ago, OneWhiteGuy said:

BLO_High

scatterer

Not sure if these mods actually conflict but you don't need both and since scatterer is a dependency of AVP, I would suggest to get rid of BLO.

14 hours ago, OneWhiteGuy said:

ksp-planetshine-master﻿

^This one looks like you've downloaded the repository (source code) of the mod instead of the mod itself. Try to use the actual mod instead
https://github.com/PapaJoesSoup/ksp-planetshine/releases/tag/0.2.6.1

If you just forgot to mention ModuleManager in your list and/or installing it still doesn't solve your issue, a more detailed explanation (what's not working? Did the moon explode or all kerbals turned yellow....almost anything is possible ) and a log file would be appreaciated
Since it can be tricky to find the correct log file, threre is a thread pinned to the mod support forum to guide you:
